verses.text: A Song of Degrees. O Lord, my heart is not exalted, neither have mine eyes been haughtilyraised: neither have I exercised myself in great matters, nor in things too wonderful for me.
I shall have sinnedif I have not been humble, but have exalted my soul: according to the relation ofa weaned child to his mother, so wilt thou recompense my soul.
Let Israel hope in the Lord, from henceforth and for ever.
